title: Community Connect
paragraph: Discover support, stories, and tips from caregivers like you. Stay informed and engaged with events, news, and insights.

cards.heading: Share Your Journey
cards.text: Connect with others, share experiences, and find solace in stories of resilience and compassion.

cards.heading: Stay Informed
cards.text: Access the latest caregiving news, events, and updates to keep you informed and prepared.

cards.heading: Learn and Grow
cards.text: Explore tips and resources tailored for caregivers, empowering you to navigate challenges and provide better care.
